@Ovilia if this is confirmed as a bug, when can we expect to have this fix available in a release ? We are currently looking at either rewriting our own zoomable chart or using one of the other third-party chart libraries. If this is indeed a bug and if the fix will come soon enough, it will make our decision easy.
There is no `toolbox.feature.dataZoom.fillerColor`. And `dataZoom.fillerColor` is worked for this part: I didn't find an option for your requirement.

Actually this is a bug from zrender, I have opened a PR https://github.com/ecomfe/zrender/pull/458

Currently, if using NotMerge mode, you have to get the current state of dataZoom by `chart.getOption`.
We should provide more detailed settings in `chart.setOption` to enable customize which chart/component will be merged and which will not.

Before the inside radius supported on polar, we have a workaround:
<https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xJzZu1Q1ri&v=2>
set [xAxis.triggerEvent](https://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#xAxis.triggerEvent) as `true` and listen to the click event of the chart.
